Rulings.Base: 1. This effect does not target.\n2. You can still activate this effect while "Necrovalley" is on the field, but you can only Special Summon a Tuner monster from your hand. If you don't have one, the effect is negated.\n3. This card's Tribute Summon has t o be the last thing to happen for the effect to activate.
